snippet: Nicolas Jaar not only composes and performs electronic music, but he also has a record label and is the inventor of a $40 cube to package and play digital music.
abstract: Nicholas Jaar composes and performs electronic music when he is not busy with his studies at Brown University; will be performing his work at the Music Hall of Williamsburg, in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Jaar not only composes and performs electronic music, but he also has a record label and is the inventor of a $40 cube to package and play digital music.

headline.seo: Nicolas Jaar, Electronic Musician and Student at Brown
